name: SWIFT (itch)
description:
SWIFT is a dynamic highscore flight game where the player controls a spectral flare which can only survive by crossing through several rings within a short time and avoiding various obstacles.

Making contact with the surroundings won’t instantly kill the player, however it will slow them down which could lead to the character’s death after its lifespan has expired. Flying through the rings will recover the maximum of the lifespan. After every round the game speed slightly raises.

A three month game project developed at the University of Applied Sciences Berlin (HTW Berlin).

Team members: Huy Vu, Alexander Günther, Anna Grinenko, Noah Dettki.

Coaches: Prof. Brandhorst, Prof. Bremer, Sven Thomas Gorholt.
